mapper.select: select blog_ID, blo_blog_ID, problem_ID, blog_message, blog_update_time from blogs where problem_ID = #{Pid} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into blogs (blog_ID, blo_blog_ID, problem_ID, blog_message, blog_update_time) VALUES (#{Bid}, #{BBid}, #{Pid}, #{Message}, now())
insert into account_blog_relation (blog_ID, account_ID, relation_type, relation_state) VALUES (#{Bid}, #{Aid}, #{type}, #{state})
